body: Guess who just finished their first #marathon? I can’t believe I actually did it! The training paid off, and crossing that #finishline felt surreal. #running #fitnessgoals

comments.body: Congrats! That’s a huge achievement. How are you feeling now? Totally exhausted or still running on adrenaline?
@23232 Thanks! Definitely a bit of both! My legs are sore, but I’m still buzzing from the excitement. Worth every mile!
Amazing! Finishing a marathon is no joke. How was the race atmosphere? Was the crowd cheering you on?
@34343 The atmosphere was incredible! The crowd definitely helped during those tough miles. So many people cheering us on—it was such a boost.
That’s awesome! Did you hit a wall at any point, or did the energy just carry you through?
@45454 Oh, I definitely hit a wall around mile 20. It got rough, but I just kept pushing. The last few miles were a mental game for sure.
Wow, huge congrats! What was your go-to song during the run to keep you going?
@56565 Thanks! I had *Eye of the Tiger* on repeat during those tough stretches—classic but it worked!
Finishing a marathon is a huge accomplishment! Do you think you’ll run another one, or is this a one-time thing?
@67676 Honestly, I might do another one! I didn’t think I’d say that, but the whole experience was amazing. I’m already thinking about the next challenge!
